name: 24_databaseTransactions
description: 1. Create project folder --> open 2. Create package.json ```shell  npm init -y  ``` 3. Install dependencies ```shell npm install mariadb ``` 4.   Create database with with create statements 5. Run the create statements (will run all commands from the text file) ```shell mysql -u root -p <"path-to-the-create-statement-file"> ```
